steps: Preheat oven to 260°C with tray inside.
Stretch dough into a 30 cm circle.
Spread tomato sauce, leaving a border.
Drizzle olive oil and bake 8–10 minutes.
Mix egg yolks, cheese, and pepper.
Combine pasta with pancetta off heat.
Stir in egg mixture until creamy.
Add tomato sauce and simmer 30 minutes.
Repeat layers and top with parmesan.
Bake 45 minutes and rest before serving.
Fold dough three times with chilling.
Spread tomato sauce in a baking dish.
Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Fry herbs until dark and aromatic.
Mix yogurt, egg yolks, saffron, oil, and salt.
Press rice firmly into greased pot or dish.
Slice pork thinly and marinate with spices.
Grill pork until cooked and slightly charred.
Assemble tacos with onion and pineapple.
Add lime juice, onion, and salt.
Shape beef into a patty and season.
Heat pan or grill with oil.
Whisk in milk to form sauce.
Mix with pasta and bake at 180°C for 25 minutes
Return eggs and add soy sauce.
Fry curry paste in a pan.
Drizzle with sesame oil and serve.
Rest 2 hours, then rinse and drain.
Mix chili flakes, garlic, and ginger.
Fry potatoes and onion until soft.
Marinate meat with yogurt and spices.
Make dough from flour and water.
Cook beef with onion and spices.
Cook rice, lentils, and pasta separately.
Blend with onion, garlic, and spices.
Add chickpeas to a food processor.
Add tahini, lemon juice, and garlic.
Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.
Roast or grill chicken until cooked.
Rub chicken with seasoning and lime juice.
Combine rice, beans, and coconut milk.
Mix maple syrup, soy sauce, and garlic.
Mix flour and beer for batter.
